casebody.data:
No. 09-11157. Steve Badue, Petitioner v. Cheryl Chun Meegan, Judge, Superior Court of California, Sacramento County, et al. 562 U.S. 864, 131 S. Ct. 149,

178 L. Ed. 2d 90,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 6537. October 4, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit denied.
